attributes.action: Publicly condemn the Saudi gang rape sentence which gave the victim of rape 200 lashes and six-months in jail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Condemn the Saudi gang rape sentence, where a 19-year-old woman, was gang-raped 14 times, after which SHE was sentenced to 200 lashes and six-months in jail. The woman was initially punished for violating laws on segregation of the sexes - she was in an unrelated man's car at the time of the attack. When she appealed, judges doubled her sentence.
